ch0124_00_mao/0101_0701_01_10:
Hey there—thanks for stopping by! How are you 
doing today, [Name:PlayerNickname ]?
ch0124_00_mao/0101_0701_02_10:
One bite of my Super Mallow Special will get you
feeling even more energized! I’ll make a bunch
so you can have some, too!
ch0124_00_mao/0601_0701_01_10: Cooking isn’t just about adding spices to a dish!
ch0124_00_mao/0601_0701_02_10: You have to smell it and taste it...
ch0124_00_mao/0601_0701_03_10:
Put in a little bit of this, add a pinch of that...
and before you know it...voilà!
ch0124_00_mao/0601_0701_04_10:
That’s how I make my dishes! What do you think?
Not so easy to copy, huh!
ch0124_00_mao/0602_0701_01_10:
I wonder if there’s a Trainer here who chose
Miltank as a partner...
ch0124_00_mao/0602_0701_02_10:
If so, I’d like to ask them to let me have a little
Moomoo Milk!
ch0124_00_mao/0602_0701_03_10:
I wanna check if it tastes different from the
Moomoo Milk we have in Alola!
ch0124_00_mao/0603_0701_01_10:
Tsareena may seem hard to approach to
some people.
ch0124_00_mao/0603_0701_02_10:
As the queen of all the Bounsweet, she has
a lot of power, and I guess that can be a
little intimidating.
ch0124_00_mao/0603_0701_03_10:
But she has her sweet moments, too! Sometimes 
she’ll let me pet her!
ch0124_00_mao/0603_0701_04_10:
I guess she must really trust me if she allows me
to do that!
ch0124_00_mao/0604_0701_01_10:
I’m confident in my ability to sniff out the best
ingredients for cooking!
ch0124_00_mao/0604_0701_02_10:
You can’t just rely on your eyes when picking
out ingredients!
ch0124_00_mao/0604_0701_03_10:
I use my chef’s intuition to pick out the cream of
the crop!
ch0124_00_mao/0605_0701_01_10:
You’ve heard of the phrase, “A friend of a friend
is a friend of mine,” right?
ch0124_00_mao/0605_0701_02_10: That’s why I’d love to introduce you to my friends!
ch0124_00_mao/0605_0701_03_10: We’d all get along great! I guarantee it!
ch0124_00_mao/1701_0701_01_10: Oh, there you are! I have something for you!
ch0124_00_mao/1701_0701_02_10:
Just like a good meal needs good ingredients,
a good sync pair needs good items!
ch0124_00_mao/1701_0702_01_10: I hope it comes in handy! It is a present, after all!
ch0124_00_mao/2501_0701_01_10:
I was born on Akala Island! It’s a place with 
a lot of nature—with the smell of the forest
and the misty sea breeze!
ch0124_00_mao/2501_0701_02_10:
I don’t know much about other places, so
everything here on Pasio is new for me!
ch0124_00_mao/2501_0701_03_10:
Akala Island is a wonderful place, but coming here
has really broadened my horizons!
ch0124_00_mao/2501_0701_04_10: That’s why I’m so glad I came here!
ch0124_00_mao/2501_0702_01_10:
I know some people from Alola who came to
Pasio, but it’s nice to meet new people, too!
ch0124_00_mao/2501_0702_02_10: Thanks so much for being a great friend!
ch0124_00_mao/2511_0701_01_10:
Have you ever thought about what you want to do
when you’re older, [Name:PlayerNickname ]?
ch0124_00_mao/2511_0701_02_10:
I’ve been thinking that I might want to take over
my family’s restaurant.
ch0124_00_mao/2511_0701_03_10:
I’ve decided that I’m gonna be an even better chef
than my dad and brother!
ch0124_00_mao/2511_0702_01_10:
One day, I’m going to make the entire menu at
my family’s restaurant Super Mallow Specials!
ch0124_00_mao/2511_0702_02_10:
It’ll be a special restaurant with nothing but
specials on the menu! I’m sure people will love it!
ch0124_00_mao/3001_0701_01_10:
Morning! Have you had breakfast yet? I’ve got a
Super Mallow Special for you, if you’re hungry!
ch0124_00_mao/3003_0701_01_10:
Thanks for stopping by! How’s your Pokémon?
Remember to take a break here and there, OK?
ch0124_00_mao/3005_0701_01_10:
Shhh...
It’s nighttime, so we have to be real quiet, OK?
